commit message:
Expose String and Boolean variants of findCards

The _order method already made the type distinction, but findCards is what actually uses that method and it was always dealing with Strings.

Fixes an error where the _order code path was falsely determined on a card search (and thus failing) by using a 'true' String instead of a boolean true.

Merge pull request #373 from hssm/findcards-parameters

Expose String and Boolean variants of findCards
